db:insert.doc:name: Create new item record
db:insert.db:sql: insert into item(id, i_deviceID, i_model, i_category, i_brand, i_description, i_type, item_rawstock, i_status, i_mr, i_price, i_photo) values(:id, :i_deviceID, :i_model, :i_category, :i_brand, :i_description, :i_type, :item_rawstock, :i_status, :i_mr, :i_price, :i_photo)

logger.doc:name: Response of new Item record created

db:update.doc:name: Update existed item record
db:update.db:sql: update item set i_description=:i_description where i_category=:i_category
